projects.title: 2021 Zakah
projects.description: Everyone can learn to code! Yes, everyone! In this live event, we are going to go through all the key basics and get you started with programming as well.

projects.title: 2022 Eid-ul-Fitr
projects.description: We know: Networking is no fun if you are an introvert person. That's why we came up with this event - it'll be so much easier. Promised!

projects.title: 2019 Covid
projects.description: You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.
